about_the_game:
Anima Keeper is an open-world first-person action RPG where you have to survive in the ruins of a fallen empire, investigating the mystery of the GHOST that entered your body and the cause of the collapse. Collect treasures, research spells, and destroy marauders. Your time in the world is limited, and if you don't get out before the collapse - you will lose everything.

Experience a truly immersive, fast-paced combat system. Use different weapons based on the situations you face. Each melee weapon boasts unique attacks with their own strengths and weaknesses. Combine grenades with melee weapons for maximum results.

Find and research new spells or create your own. Magic in Anima Keeper doesn't just apply to your character's inner abilities. Humans have adapted to magical anomalies and can control them by creating new devices. By exploring the world and building a reputation with merchants, you can unlock new crafting recipes for amazing devices.

The world of Anima Keeper is callous and challenging. Danger will be waiting for you at every corner. Most places have their unique story, which can be discovered by traveling to the astral world, a separate dimension that holds more information. The creatures of the astral world do not like visitors, so be sure you are well prepared.

The lands of collapse are full of treasures and those who want to get them at any cost. Hunters often fill their backpacks with everything they find, only to find themselves without free space at crucial moments, succumbing to their own greed and time constraints. Collect only valuable items and increase your reputation by trading with vendors from your hideout.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Time is always running out in Anima Keeper. Your main goal is to survive before the collapse comes. Marauders, mystical creatures, mutated monsters with deformed souls - they all want you dead. Do whatever it takes to gather treasures and hide in a shelter before the final wave of collapse.
